channel.title: When som1 dies, making it so it drops 10k cash on the ground
channel.description: I need help with: When som1 dies, making it so it drops 10k cash on the ground which everyone can see it and pick up.

item.title: When som1 dies, making it so it drops 10k cash on the ground
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Thats the problem. you’re going to ‘make’ your whole server based off of other people’s work. Learn to do something for yourself. besides, I walked you through it. and you apparently want me to do it for you. correct? well I’m not going to, get off your lazy ass and do it yourself.

item.title: When som1 dies, making it so it drops 10k cash on the ground
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“PatScape, post:2, topic:189465”][quote author=parkview link=topic=252372.msg2110612#msg2110612 date=1205608358]
Dont you just hate it when a 13 year old trying to make a server doesnt even know what the hell java coding is?
[/quote]

First of all, you’re asking an extremely basic question. Everything you possibly need to make this work is all nicely bundled in client.java for you. I can guarantee that If you had any sense of what those lines of code meant, you could come up with how to do this in 5 minutes. Apparently you don’t, which makes you an extreme hypocrite for having that signature.

Let’s think this through. Someone dies. Find the method (got any clue what the hell a method is?) that is called to do the gfx and looping through inventory items etc. when your character is declared dead. Figure out what method is called to drop an item on the ground (obviously in the client.java, and if you haven’t used this method before you should move back to your precious RuneScape and get out of anything more complex than writing a word document). Add the item dropping method to the dying method, and make the dropping method’s arguments the coin ID, and the amount (10000).[/quote]

Failure. Learn Java vocabulary.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

parkview:

Dont you just hate it when a 13 year old trying to make a server doesnt even know what the hell java coding is?

First of all, you’re asking an extremely basic question. Everything you possibly need to make this work is all nicely bundled in client.java for you. I can guarantee that If you had any sense of what those lines of code meant, you could come up with how to do this in 5 minutes. Apparently you don’t, which makes you an extreme hypocrite for having that signature.

Let’s think this through. Someone dies. Find the method (got any clue what the hell a method is?) that is called to do the gfx and looping through inventory items etc. when your character is declared dead. Figure out what method is called to drop an item on the ground (obviously in the client.java, and if you haven’t used this method before you should move back to your precious RuneScape and get out of anything more complex than writing a word document). Add the item dropping method to the dying method, and make the dropping method’s arguments the coin ID, and the amount (10000).
